attributes.title: Trump
attributes.review:
This app is horrible no good thinks come out of this. It may be politics but this is horrible I do not recommend this app. A lot of you should open your eyes and see how terrible D.Trump is we as a community need to stick together as one to over through Trump.

VOTE MITCHELL OBAMA AS PRESIDENT!!
🇺🇸

attributes.title: Horrible
attributes.review: I ALMOST DIED. It’s absolutely horrific I was in so much shock that I had a seizure and was sent to the hospital. Because of this I now have corona because apparently trump says that you don’t need a mask. I no longer support him #settleforbiden #biden2020

attributes.title: I wish my backyard was emo so it would cut itself
attributes.review: Imagine impregnating your beautiful wife and you guys go through nine hard months of pregnancy and her water finally breaks and your beautiful son is born, and then you’re stupid wife decides to name her  DONALD !!!!!

attributes.title: Absolutely Apalling
attributes.review: I opened the app and it was awful. It hasn’t been working at all. I also don’t like the fact that the person this app is promoting is a rapist and also racist, sexist, homophobic, anti-semetic, and scarily has a lot of hitler like qualities

attributes.title: 1 STAR OVERALL TERRIBLE
attributes.review: Listen I’m not a Libby but when I opens this app I was hoping for great things but when I tell you SO MANY PEOPLE CAME TO MY HOUSE they said they came from the trump app and I didn’t even know this some people even tried to rob me too DONT DOWNLOAD GETS ALL YOUR INFORMATION!!!!!

attributes.title: So bad
attributes.review: This app is terrible I hate it there are so many glitches and it is just sad that our president hasn’t done anything for our country that is meaningful and no he wants to ban TikTok heck no gen Z ain’t going down without a fight 😡

attributes.title: Worst app
attributes.review: Took 2 weeks to upload and it kept kicking me out of the app and there was glitches I only recommend it if u want to take up your storage it is a horrible app.

attributes.title: I think the think not ! 😔😡
attributes.review: This app is so slow ! I mean I watched a whole movie before this downloaded! What’s the point of having a app if it doesn’t even download😡 sorry not sorry worst app ever !😡🥺🧚

attributes.title: DO NOT EVEN LOOK INTO DOWNLOADING
attributes.review: Firstly there is nothing good about this president. He is disgusting and just making America worst as the days go on. He is a racist and the things he has done/plans are doing don’t look like it’s going to help America anytime soon.

attributes.title: Horrible
attributes.review: First of all it's glitchy and keeps logging me out and second of all sometimes the screen just decides to freeze whenever I open the app.
